example.eg: The spring was made of flexible steel.
example.egtrans: 那个弹簧是用柔韧的钢做成的。

example.eg: Ron was on a new flexible work schedule.
example.egtrans: 荣恩当时有灵活的工作安排。

example.eg: Rachel had been doing yoga for a long time and was very flexible.
example.egtrans: 瑞秋当时已经练习瑜伽很长一段时间了，身体很柔韧了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 身体柔韧的，柔韧性好的

example.eg: Susan is very flexible, she'll go along with anything.
example.egtrans: 苏珊的性格非常温顺。她什么都会同意。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 性格温顺的, 生性柔顺的
